name: New Super Kaizo Bros.
overview: HI WELCOME TO NEW SUPER KAIZO BROS THIS IS MY FIRST MARIO KAIZO HACK AND YOU CAN FIND SOME WALL JUMP SETUPS I HOPE YOU ENJOY. AND THANKS FOR DOWNLOAD AND PLAY. THIS HACK HAVE 24 EXITS. New Super Kaizo Bros features: - custom musics - retry system - wall kick -Version 1.1 changes : Adding Layer 3 Backgrounds. Adding More Musics. some palettes was changed. Removing Status Bar. Fixing big boo boss in first castle. no hammer bro in water level. no spiny with a bad framerule in end of desert level. in HUNTER level fixig last section with yoshi. level one now have little changes. Cape level have some changes. fixing some bad tiles.
